code: import axios from"axios";const API_URL="http://localhost:5000/api";export const login=async(email,password)=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/login"),{email,password});return res.data;};export const register=async user=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/register"),user);return res.data;};export const getUsers=async token=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/users"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return res.data;};// Diğer API fonksiyonları (cari, servis, garanti, satış, sipariş) ileride eklenecek
